channel.title: INartsAndEnt
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INartsAndEnt, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: “What, Are You Allergic To Money?”: Tom Hanks Reflects On Cancelled Forrest Gump 2 After Reuniting With Director For New Movie
item.description: After reuniting with director Robert Zemeckis on their new movie, Tom Hanks reflects back on cancelled plans to have him return for Forrest Gump 2.

item.title: Time Cut: How Old Lucy & Summer Field Are In 2003 & 2024
item.description: Time Cut's confusing timeline shifts and twisty time travel storyline make it hard not to wonder how old its main characters, Lucy and Summer, are.

item.title: Donald Trump and Mark Cuban Beefing Over Phone Calls, Golf

item.title: How Downton Abbey 3 Will Be A "Great Lasting Tribute" To Maggie Smith Thoughtfully Explained By Co-Star
item.description: Downton Abbey 3 star Hugh Bonneville thoughtfully explains how the movie will be a tribute to Dame Maggie Smith after the actor's death in September.
